data.message: I became a kidney donor 7 years ago because of Facebook.

replies.message: That's great to hear, Phil! Thanks for sharing. -Jordan

Facebook , the very first day I was on FB, I found out that one of my college professors (from more than 25 years earlier) needed a kidney...he was on dialysis 4 days a week.  Some 6 months later, we were at the University of Alabama-University of Alabama at Birmingham Hospital, with me giving him a life-saving Kidney.  I have FB to thank for this.
Hi Phil. Your story really put a smile on our faces. Thanks so much for taking the time to share and for being a donor. <3 -Azaria
